messages.subject: Fwd: Japanese Invasion of Korea
messages.msgSnippet: Guys, In case anyone is interested, I have added another reference to my bibliography on the Japanese Invasion of Korea.  It is: “Shogun’s March to Peking,
messages.messageBody:
Guys,

In case anyone is interested, I have added another reference to my
bibliography on the Japanese Invasion of Korea. It is:

“Shogun’s March to Peking, 1592-58 (sic)”, by Joseph Miranda, Strategy &
Tactics, #223, pp 40-53.

p 42 shows a picture of Chong Pal (Korean Officer) at the Battle of Pusan.
p 52 shows the defense of Tadaejin by Koreans armed with swords, spears,
and tridents.

I will update the list I posted in the group's files.

Bob Burke



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
